amendment.description: To reallocate 10 percent of the amounts appropriated for capital investments in surface transportation infrastructure from transportation enhancement activities to the highway bridge program.

action.text: Amendment SA 821 proposed by Senator Paul.
Amendment SA 821 under the order of 10/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 60. Record Vote Number: 190.
